activities: InXpo, Inc. is a software company which provides virtual events to customers.  InXpo’s software and proprietary computer platform is able to recreate physical events, such as tradeshows, meetings, conferences and career fairs and offer them virtually for businesses worldwide.  With respect to the types of personal information InXpo may receive from EU members, each event typically requires registration information which would include the event attendees name, email address, and in some cases the business the individual represents.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
personaldata: Name, email address, place of business. Does not include manually processed data
recoursemech: International Centre for Dispute Resolution of the American Arbitration Association (AAA) (ICDR/AAA Safe Harbor Program)
